NotFoundPage.title: Pagina no encotrada
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stubled upon a page that doesn't exist.

CardHello.card-hello-description: Disfruto aprendiendo cosas nuevas e intento superar nuevos desafíos mientras analizo cómo mejorar a través de ellos.

experience.title: Experiencia
experience.paragraph: I am a passionate self-taught software developer seeking new challenges. I specialize in front-end and serverless backend development using TypeScript, React.js, and Node.js. Even when faced with challenging problems, I know how to address them with patience, determination, and unwavering perseverance.

Autonomous.achievements: Metrics System: I designed and implemented a metrics system to provide users with valuable insights into the performance and outcomes of their actions.|Data Selection Tables: I developed interactive tables that allowed users to mass-select data, enhancing efficiency and usability.|AI Testing Playground: I established a playground where users could conduct tests on the artificial intelligence we developed, utilizing technologies such as OpenAI and gpt3-tokenizer.|Document Import: I designed and programmed buttons that facilitated the import of documents in PDF, JSON, and CSV formats, enhancing platform interoperability.|Login System: I implemented a secure and user-friendly login system to ensure user authentication.|Design Process: I led the design process from the prototyping stage in Figma to code implementation, ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience.|Technologies Used: To develop this platform, I utilized technologies such as Next.js, Supabase, Theme UI, Zustand, OpenAI, and gpt3-tokenizer.

SIA-srl.achievements: Designed the model in Figma.|Developed the website using Next.js and Sanity.|Implemented size filters to enable users to quickly find plush toys based on their preferences.|Added an efficient search bar to facilitate the discovery of specific products.|Created an interactive shopping cart and a quotation function.|Showcased special offers to increase the platform's appeal.

Skills.card-skills-description: También estoy aprendiendo TypeScript a través de mis repositorios de código abierto. Aparte de eso, también practico constantemente el diseño web.

Contact.card-contact-description: Haga un contacto por correo electrónico o DM de Twitter.
